code: export function minLenght(min_number){var minLenght_rule={min:min_number,message:"Es necesario ingresar m\xEDnimo ".concat(min_number," caracteres")};return minLenght_rule;}export function maxLenght(max_number){var maxLenght_rule={required:max_number,message:"Es necesario ingresar m\xE1ximo ".concat(max_number," caracteres")};return maxLenght_rule;}export function required(campo){var required_rule={required:true,message:"El campo ".concat(campo," es requerido")};return required_rule;}export function type_email(){var email_rule={type:'email',message:"El correo no es valido"};return email_rule;}export function Validate(){}
